/* Recent History */ Summarizing the information, moving it to the Peru nat team at Copa Am page. Indiscipline scandal is already noted on that page as well. Keep contributing! :D
/* First golden generation */ Removed unsourced statement. Brazil and Argentina were not considered "powerhouses" at this point, and their abscence was not uncommon.
Peru has had many "coach eras", so it's best to call the sections by the historical periods.
/* The dark years */ Peru's problematic situation has been going on since 1982.
